3arabawy.name: 3arabawy
3arabawy.shortDescription: Car marketplace app for buying, selling, and renting vehicles, parts, and services.
3arabawy.fullDescription: A large-scale automotive marketplace supporting car sales, rentals, services, spare parts, and motorcycles, designed to handle heavy media usage and real-time interaction.
responsibilities: Designed and maintained scalable mobile architecture using Clean Architecture
Implemented listing systems for cars, services, parts, and motorcycles
Built image and media upload pipelines
Refactored global state management into modular event-based structure
Collaborated closely with backend team on API contracts and improvements

technicalChallenges.problem: Pagination performance optimization by removing heavy blur rendering
technicalChallenges.solution: Removed blur from list views and moved rich rendering to preview screens.

technicalChallenges.problem: Memory and rebuild optimization for media-heavy screens
technicalChallenges.solution: Reduced rebuilds, optimized loading, and managed memory carefully.

technicalChallenges.problem: Arabic search normalization to handle Unicode inconsistencies
technicalChallenges.solution: Applied Arabic normalization and removed diacritics.
technicalChallenges.result: Highly accurate and consistent Arabic search behavior.

technicalChallenges.problem: Background processing for uploads and long-running tasks
technicalChallenges.result: Reliable uploads without blocking user interaction.

seo.title: 3arabawy App | Car Marketplace Platform in Egypt
seo.description: 3arabawy is a car marketplace mobile application built with Flutter, allowing users to buy, sell, and rent cars, parts, and services across Egypt.

mdone.name: MDone
mdone.shortDescription: Medical booking app connecting patients with doctors.
mdone.fullDescription: Medical appointment booking application connecting patients with doctors.
responsibilities: Implemented voice calls using Agora RTC
Optimized UI flows for medical use cases

seo.title: MDone App | Medical Appointment Booking Application
seo.description: MDone is a Flutter-based medical appointment application enabling patients to book doctors, chat in real time, and manage healthcare services.

toltura.name: TOLTURA
toltura.shortDescription: Specialist discovery platform allowing users to find professionals.
toltura.fullDescription: Service discovery platform connecting users with specialists across multiple categories.
responsibilities: Implemented specialist listing and filtering systems

seo.title: TOLTURA | Specialist Discovery Platform
seo.description: TOLTURA is a mobile application for discovering specialists and professionals across various categories in Kyrgyzstan.

biznavi.name: Biznavi
biznavi.shortDescription: Corporate HR management mobile application for internal company workflows.
biznavi.fullDescription: Corporate HR management application designed for internal company workflows.
leadership: Acted as Tech Lead for the project
Participated in technical planning and architecture decisions
Reviewed code and guided implementation standards
Managed feature delivery and cross-team communication

seo.title: Biznavi | HR Management Application
seo.description: Biznavi is a corporate HR management app built with Flutter for streamlining internal company workflows in South Korea.

party-player.name: Party Player
party-player.shortDescription: Music and media application for shared playback and entertainment.
party-player.fullDescription: Music and media application supporting audio and video playback.
responsibilities: Implemented cloud-based logic and real-time features
Handled background audio and media playback
Built custom native plugin for device orientation detection
Worked across mobile and backend integration

seo.title: Party Player | Music & Media App
seo.description: Party Player is a Flutter-based music and entertainment application for shared media playback in the USA market.

installment-app.name: Installment App
installment-app.shortDescription: Business utility application for managing merchant installment payments.
installment-app.fullDescription: Business utility application for managing merchant installment payments.

seo.title: Installment App | Business Payment Utility
seo.description: Installment App is a business utility for managing merchant installment payments, built with Flutter.
